body:
- Classes que aprendem: Warrior (133), Thief (87)
- Descricao: Esta skill permite verificar se ha alguem nas salas ao redor de seu executor, indicando seu nome, direcao e distancia que se encontra.
- Exemplo de uso:	> scan
			You quickly scan the area and see:
			Luigi, right here
			Seker, right here
			the Immortal Innkeeper, immediately to the north
			the wandering spirit, immediately to the east
			the wandering spirit, immediately to the east
			Zhantar, immediately to the east
			the Immortal Postmaster, immediately to the west
			Mordron, immediately downwards
			the Questmaster Ashlandar, immediately downwards
- Calculo da distancia ate o alvo: 
			right here	se encontra na mesma sala
			immediately	1 sala de distancia
			nearby		2 salas de distancia
			a ways		3 salas de distancia
			far		4 salas de distancia
			very far		5 salas de distancia
			extremely far	6 salas de distancia
			impossibly far	7 salas de distancia

- Observacoes: O gasto, em pontos de movimento, e de (Nivel do player/9) pontos por uso do SCAN.
